title: S4 Ep19: Are socially responsible banks more resilient?
itunes:title: Are socially responsible banks more resilient?
description: ESG – Environmental, Social and Governance – measures of bank performance are getting a lot of attention from shareholders and policymakers. But might more investment in ESG make banks less resilient? Thomas Gehrig tells Tim Phillips what the first research on this topic reveals.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
